response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $10,800. This represents a significant saving of $1,200 compared to the original value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this offer presents a great opportunity for both of us, ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a favorable price. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 10800}
